author: jleroux
msg: Revert shark enabling changes commited by error with update of ASL2 headers

author: pamarcelot
msg: Fixing Jira DIRSTUDIO-34 (Add icons for new AT, OC & Schema Wizards).

author: hlship
msg: Move some of the Cookie support services into the internal package and module.
Add support for meta-data specified inside the ComponentClass annotation.
Change the default persistence stratgy inside the Perist annotation to be the empty string.
Refactor various methods related to field persistence.
A blank persistence strategy now causes a search up the component hierarchy for a meta data value for key tapestry.persistence-strategy.

author: mharwood
msg: Fixed bug when BooleanFilter class is used in conjunction with cached filters - the anding of filters' bitsets was changing the original rather than taking a copy of the contents. Changed to use BitSet.clone before performing any destructive operation

author: prasad
msg: * commented code put for jndi lookup of ejb for jetty container
* commented code put for <ejb-ref> in web.xml
